title: Enhanced Image Contrast using Multi-Histogram Equalization with Spatial-Constrained Clustering
venue: IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (Under Review)
abstract: This paper presents a novel approach for image enhancement using multi-histogram equalization combined with spatial-constrained clustering algorithms. We evaluate four clustering methods (K-Means, FCM, GMM, HDBSCAN) in HSV color space and demonstrate superior performance across multiple benchmark datasets. Our method achieves SSIM scores above 0.92 while maintaining natural color appearance and avoiding over-enhancement artifacts.

title: Robust Deep Steganography using Adversarial Training
venue: International Conference on Machine Learning (In Preparation)
abstract: We propose an enhanced deep steganography framework based on AttenHideNet architecture with adversarial training to improve robustness against steganalysis attacks. Our method achieves 28% improvement in robustness while maintaining high visual quality (PSNR >40dB) and data hiding capacity.
